summary: Internal email correspondence among U.S. Attorney's Office Southern District of New York staff regarding a potential 60 Minutes feature on Jeffrey Epstein, with a note that the promo is 'on the death'.

events.title: Potential 60 Minutes Epstein Feature
events.description: Internal email indicates 60 Minutes might run a feature on Jeffrey Epstein, with a promo on their website described as being 'on the death'.

keyFacts: Internal DOJ email discusses a potential 60 Minutes feature on Jeffrey Epstein.
The email mentions the promo for the segment is 'on the death'.
Communication is between U.S. Attorney's Office Southern District of New York staff.
The email is dated January 3, 2020, referencing a possible airing on the upcoming Sunday (January 5, 2020).
